overview:
## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindowController/init(windowNibPath:owner:)] was used to initialize the instance, [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindowController/windowNibName] contains the last path component with the “`.nib`” extension stripped off. If [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindowController/init(windowNibName:)] or [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindowController/init(windowNibName:owner:)] was used, [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindowController] contains the name without the “`.nib`” extension.

# windowNibName

**Instance Property**

The name of the nib file that stores the window associated with the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var windowNibName: NSNib.Name? { get }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindowController/init(windowNibPath:owner:)] was used to initialize the instance, [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindowController/windowNibName] contains the last path component with the “`.nib`” extension stripped off. If [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindowController/init(windowNibName:)] or [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindowController/init(windowNibName:owner:)] was used, [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindowController] contains the name without the “`.nib`” extension.

## Getting Nib and Storyboard Information

- **owner**: The owner of the nib file containing the window managed by the receiver.
- **storyboard**: The storyboard file from which the window controller was loaded.
- **windowNibPath**: The full path of the nib file that stores the window associated with the receiver.
